org.opendaylight.controller.usermanager

Interface IAAAProvider


  • public interface IAAAProvider
    IAAAProvider exposes a pluggable interface for 3rd party Authentication and Authorization providers to support the UserManager with AAA management.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthResponse authService(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String server, java.lang.String secretKey)
      Authenticate user with AAA server and return authentication and authorization info using the Provider's mechanism
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the Name of the Provider

    • Method Detail

      • authService

        AuthResponse authService(java.lang.String userName,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String server,
                       java.lang.String secretKey)
        Authenticate user with AAA server and return authentication and authorization info using the Provider's mechanism
        Parameters:
        userName - the username
        password - the password
        server - AAA server ip address in string form
        secretKey - shared secret between the AAA client and AAA server
        Returns:
        AuthResponse Authentication and Authorization Response

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the Name of the Provider
        Returns:
        Name of the AAA provider
